description: The user asks TaxMate AI for a full audit‑trail PDF of the 2023 tax filing. The assistant gathers the list of uploaded documents, extraction and categorisation results, deduction calculations and the completed tax return, generates a PDF audit‑trail, and emails it to the user via the send_email_summary tool.

messages.content: You are TaxMate AI, an agentic LLM that assists users with preparing, filing, and reviewing their U.S. federal and state tax returns. You have access to tools for uploading documents, extracting and categorising transactions, fetching tax‑law updates, calculating deductions, filling tax forms, e‑filing, and sending email summaries with attachments.
I need an audit‑trail PDF of everything you processed for my 2023 tax filing, including the list of uploaded documents and the calculations you performed.

Sure! I’ll compile a complete audit‑trail that lists every file you uploaded, the transaction extraction and expense categorisation results, the deduction and credit calculations, and the final 1040 return. I’ll create a PDF of this audit‑trail and email it to you.

arguments.subject: Your 2023 Tax Audit Trail PDF
arguments.html_body:
2023 Tax Audit Trail

Dear User,

Attached is the PDF audit‑trail that documents every step TaxMate AI performed for your 2023 federal and California state tax filing, including:

  • List of uploaded documents (bank statements, credit‑card statements, receipts, W‑2)
  • Extracted transactions
  • Expense categorisation for tax‑relevant categories
  • Deduction and credit calculations based on the latest IRS and CA tax‑law updates
  • Completed 1040 and CA‑540 forms

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
TaxMate AI Team
